ygData.subject: Re: Places to hunt for a lvl 13 or above wizard....
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I have had quite enough of this. An EQ-Wizards newsletter is one thing. An EQ-Wizards mega-messageboard that is delivered straight to your e-mail is
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I have had quite enough of this. An EQ-Wizards newsletter is one thing.
An EQ-Wizards mega-messageboard that is delivered straight to your e-mail is
another. I NEED to be able to go through my e-mail without having to sift
through 100+ EQ-Wizards e-mails a day. PLEASE! FOR THE LOVE OF GOD, REMOVE
ME! REMOVE! REMOVE! REMOVE! IIIIiiiiieeeeeeeeeeeee!!!!

P.S. Visit Monsterfodder, your Karana source for comedy and commerce!
"http://members.xoom.com/Scrivener" Now searching for a REAL host.


eq_wizards@onelist.com Said:
> From: "McGraw, T. David" <Mcgraw.Thomas@...>
>
> Couple of other places...
>
> North Ro - You can take dervishes and madmen with a group.
>
> Oasis - Again with a group you can take caimans and crocs and the
occasional
> ghoul that spawns there.
>
> East Karana - With a full group you can take the carrion spiders, gorge
> hounds, lion patriarchs and the gnoll reavers. This is a tough area but
well
> worth it(it is where I am hunting at 15th and have been since 12th).
>
> Unrest - Get a group and rock on, enough said.
>
> Befallen - Get a group and stick to the 2nd level(greater skels and such).
> Another rocking place, just a little more dangerous than Unrest.
>
> Paw - This is good up until around 16th and then it gets stale.
>
> West Karana - Miller's farm, you and a cleric start taking down scarecrows,
> great exp, crappy loot.
>
> Southern Ro - Hard to get to but tons of ghouls, mummies, spiders and other
> stuff. One of my favorite spots but you have to travel through the sand
> giant spawning location in the Oasis to get here.
>
> I hope that is enough for now, if not let me know and I will name some
> others.
>
> Yours,
>
> ~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr
>
> = 9= 9-----Original Message-----
> = 9= 9From:= 9Spehar, David J

> = 9= 9From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>
>
> = 9= 9Unrest is good if you are in Felwithe area or at least on
> that continent.
> = 9= 9Not sure about the other continents as I have asked the same
> question about
> = 9= 9my 15th level wizard hunting in Karana.
>
> = 9= 9- Ziff
>

> = 9= 9From: Josh Zimmerman <zimm7817@...>

> = 9= 9Any help in this area would be greatly appreciated, also if
> you could
> = 9= 9give a short description on how to go about finding them it
> would help a
> = 9= 9great deal. Nothing in depth, I like to explore, I just
> want some sort
> = 9= 9of direction to head.
>
> = 9= 9Thanks for your time,
> = 9= 9Illistar, lvl13 Eurdite Wizard, Veeshan Server
